channel.title: Attacking a npc first walking up on it?
channel.description:
Basically what i want to know is how to make your character walk up on the npc then attack it, beause currently in my source he attacks from far away and the npc walks up on me at the same time. Im asking this because ive fixed npc clipping, and want my guy to walk up on it first then attacking it like runescape.
♥Val

item.title: Attacking a npc first walking up on it?

item.description:

Wow thanks for the help… don’t post if you can’t help.
